title: Montessori Science - Children's Journey to Lifetime Discovery
headline: Learn how to use Montessori principles to teach children to love science and discovery in this free online course.
description: This Montessori education course is designed to help you build a solid scientific foundation for children. We teach you how to cultivate a lifelong interest in learning by explaining scientific concepts to children using the Montessori method. We also provide several exciting activities to explain basic concepts of zoology, botany and physics to show kids that discovery can be fun and rewarding, thus fuelling their future interest in science.

courseDescription:
Science is the study of nature and its laws driven by keen observation. When it comes to observation, no one is as observant as preschoolers. Various studies indicate that Montessori children possess a heightened sense of observation. This course teaches you how to provide children with the correct support to let them develop their observation skills to their full world-changing potential. The Montessori environment creates this opportunity.

Cultivating a respect for science in children is important so experts at Montessori Pro have based this course on Dr Maria Montessori's proven ideals. Our study material is divided into four topics, starting with Dr Montessori's vision of teaching science to children. We establish the importance of introducing children to biology and explain the organisation of the Montessori ‘science shelf’.

Our next three topics discuss concepts concerning plants, animals, the human body and physics. Numerous activities are included, along with simple step-by-step instructions. We teach you how to perform various activities with children that demonstrate magnetism, colours, buoyancy, growth of plants and so on. Our ‘Resources’ section contains various pictures, tables and tabs to make the content appealing. Some formative questions are added to the end of each topic to help you assess their progress throughout the course. This course will benefit both parents and teachers as they use the respected Montessori method to set children on a lifelong journey of discovery.
